PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-03682003-03-25,  ,  PCO,  , 
ActPublic Service Staff Relations Act
PrecisRe-appointment of JOSEPH WILLIAM POTTER of Gloucester, Ontario, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Public Service Staff Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of two years; and orders that he shall be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; effective April 1, 2003.
AttachmentsAttachment
